idea-plugin.name: Raven
idea-plugin.description:
Overview

Introducing a new IntelliJ theme called Raven, which offers a sleek and visually pleasing experience for developers. With its dark and minimalist design, Raven aims to provide a refreshing and immersive environment that enhances focus and productivity.

The theme incorporates a mixture of dark grays and deep blues, creating a striking contrast that is easy on the eyes. This choice of color scheme not only adds a touch of elegance, but also reduces eye strain, especially during extended coding sessions.


Known intelliJ behavior:

After applying theme sometimes the editor color scheme sets to 'Classic Light'. When this happens, following solution will work:

  1. Open intelliJ Settings window.
  2. Type 'color scheme' in the search bar.
  3. On the right side panel, select 'Raven' from the scheme dropdown list.
  4. Click Apply and OK to close settings.

      5. Report Issue:

      Report issues

      Available themes:

             Raven - Ice blue accent
      Note: For the best results it is recommended to restart intellij after installing and uninstalling plugins.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Introducing a new Raven dark theme - Ice blue accent.
